articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Firing Contest among MLRS Batteries of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Firing Contest among MLRS Batteries of KPA
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), guided a firing contest among multiple launch rocket system (MLRS) batteries selected from large combined units of the KPA.
					 The Supreme Commander was briefed on the mode and method of the contest at an observation post and issued an order to start the contest.
					
					 He underscored the need to conduct the training of artillery units under the simulated conditions of an actual battle in order to prepare all gunners to be capable of hitting targets anytime, saying that he could easily learn that their training was highly intensified under the worst conditions.
					
					 When the order to fire was given, all the gunners in the contest opened fire with a will to reduce the enemy's post to ashes at a strike.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed his satisfaction over the fact that all targets were hit properly, saying that the gunners are very excellent at firing and all of them are snipers.
					
					 He gave a high appreciation of the successful contest.
					
					 He said the contest proved once again that if the gunners make it a rule to conduct trainings under the simulated conditions of an actual war in order to move quickly in conformity with any changing situation and their combat mission and ensure precision predicting and adjusted fire, with main stress put on raising the hit rate, they will display telling shots any time in any place.
					
					 He gave important instructions for bolstering up the artillery.
					
					 Noting that this year began and ends with the sound of gunfire, he called on the commanding officers and gunners to intensify the training day and night, true to the intention of the Party channeling big efforts into rounding off the artillery combat readiness and thus pave the way for southward advance and provide the victory of war with bull's-eye strikes.
					
					 In the contest, the first place was taken by battery under the 8th Corps, the second place by battery under the 3rd Corps and the third place by battery under the 7th Corps.
					
					 Crack-shot certificates, medals and badges were awarded to the successful MLRS batteries under the 8th, 3rd, 7th, 10th and 9th Corps of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Night Assault Combat Flight Drill of KPA Pursuit Plane Regiment
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Night Assault Combat Flight Drill of KPA Pursuit Plane Regiment
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, guided the night assault combat flight drill of fighter pilots of Hero Kil Yong Jo Pursuit Plane Regiment.
					 He learned about the sortie preparedness of the pursuit planes at the stopping place.
					
					 Looking at the plan of the drill at the observation post, he heard a report from the commander of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force and issued an order to start the drill.
					
					 He said that he could watch well if the planes are flying properly despite darkness, very pleased that the pilots are good at aerobatics and the command of the flight has been put on a scientific and modern basis on a high level.
					
					 At last the planes reached the sky above the targeted area one by one.
					
					 Seeing the planes hitting the targets on the display, he said the targets are hit. He clapped his hands with a broad smile on his face, noting it seems to watch the drill in daytime, not at night.
					
					 "As I emphasized whenever watching the rehearsal of fighter pilots, the battle for defending the territorial air of the country is not fought, depending on weather or time, and a modern warfare is waged in the worst conditions. It is, therefore, necessary to fully prepare the fighter pilots as able airmen and all-round ones capable of successfully carrying out any aerial combat duty in any adversity by conducting similar drill in the future," he stressed.
					
					 Noting that the reliable fighter pilots of the Party fully demonstrated that they are ready to go into action anytime once an order is issued, though the above-said drill was organized all of a sudden, he said:
					
					 "Thanks to the death-defying corps of the airmen possessed of the indomitable spirit of defending the country and the self-blasting spirit, the sky of the country will always remain azure."
					
					 He met with the pilots and had a photo taken with them, congratulating them on their successful drill.
					
					 Warmly shaking hands with the pilots who were moved to tears, he said the indomitable spirit displayed by the pilots in the drill hardly possible without strong pluck is the priceless moral assets and that the Party and the country and its people are very proud of them. He asked commanding officers to convey his greetings to all air persons and other service members and their families of the unit.
					
					 He gave the thanks of the supreme commander of the KPA to the regiment and showed deep loving care for it.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA Vice Marshal Ri Myong Su, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Army Col. General Ri Yong Gil, first vice-chief of the General Staff of the KPA and director of the General Operational Bureau of the KPA, and Ri Pyong Chol, first vice-department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Condolences to German FM
articles.content:
Condolences to German FM
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a message of condolences to his German counterpart FrankÔºçWalter Steinmeier on Wednesday as regards the terrorist attack in Berlin that caused heavy casualties.
					 The message extended deep sympathy and condolences to the foreign minister and bereaved families of the victims.
					
					 Reiterating the consistent stand of the DPRK's government against all forms of terrorism, the message sincerely hoped that the government and people of Germany would eradicate the aftermath of the attack as soon as possible.

articles.title: Different Bodies of DPRK Send Wreaths to Russian Embassy
articles.content:
Different Bodies of DPRK Send Wreaths to Russian Embassy
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Different institutions of the DPRK sent wreaths to the Russian embassy here on Tuesday and Wednesday in memory of Andrei Karlov, Russian ambassador to Turkey.
					 Laid before his portrait were wreaths from the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of External Economic Relations, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations; So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries; Mun Jae Chol, vice-director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps; and other officials concerned.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased and made entries in the mourner's book.

articles.title: Social Scientists Hold Symposium on Kim Jong Un's Exploits
articles.content:
Social Scientists Hold Symposium on Kim Jong Un's Exploits
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- A symposium of social scientists took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.
					 It dealt with the exploits of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who led the 200-day campaign to victory.
					
					 The symposium heard papers explaining and proving the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Un who organized and led the campaign to victory at to provide another radical turn in the history of struggle for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Speakers said Kim Jong Un made sure that a great ideological campaign involving all members of the party was waged with his unusual wisdom and skillful organizing ability, thus bringing the mental power of the army and people into full play.
					
					 They also said that he gave field guidance day and night, leading all the fields and units to kindle the flames of creating Mallima speed.
					
					 He saw to it that a miraculous victory of turning misfortune into favorable conditions was brought about in the indefatigable spirit of defending the people and serving them, and the revolutionary traits of the Workers' Party of Korea devotedly serving the people were fully displayed and the close unity between the Party and the masses was consolidated thousand-fold, they stressed.
					
					 Under his guidance, the powerful defence capabilities for self-defence with the nuclear armed force as a backbone have seen greater increase and the strategic position of the DPRK has been further consolidated, they added.
					
					 They also noted that Kim Jong Un opened a breakthrough toward implementing the five-year strategy for the development of the national economy and thus ushered in the new heyday in building a highly civilized socialist country.
					
					 The speakers called on all the officials, party members and other people to firmly arm with the leadership feats of Kim Jong Un who brought about a victory in the 200-day campaign and harden the faith that the cause of building a socialist power of Juche is sure to emerge victorious as long as there is Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the symposium were officials concerned, teachers, researchers, lecturers, journalists and editors in the field of science, education, media, the preservation of revolutionary relics and of institutions for training party cadres.

articles.title: Birthday Spreads to Persons of Merits
articles.content:
Birthday Spreads to Persons of Merits
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent birthday spreads to Academician, Prof. and Dr. Pak Je Un, vice-president of the Academy of Science of Wonsan University of Agriculture, on his 80th birthday and Labor Hero Pak Mi Sul, manager of the Unha Garment Factory of Servicemen's Families in Hamhung, on her 70th birthday.
					 Born into a poor peasant family in Hwadae County of North Hamgyong Province before the liberation of the country, Pak Je Un experienced the suffering as a member of the stateless nation. He had worked as a teacher and a researcher at Wonsan University of Agriculture with a single purpose to repay the benevolence of President Kim Il Sung, who liberated the country and let his hope for study be realized, and exerted all his efforts on education and scientific research.
					
					 He authored a lot of books, textbooks and reference books such as "Complete Book on Kimilsungia", "Complete Book on Kimjongilia" and "Agro-Forestry Cultivation".
					
					 Pak Mi Sul, who was born into an ordinary family in a mountainous village in Jongphyong County of South Hamgyong Province, has faithfully worked as the manager of the factory for more than 30 years, bearing in mind the benevolence of the Party.
					
					 She refurbished the building of the factory in line with the requirements of the new century and has over-fulfilled the national economic plan every year.

articles.title: Foreign Women Tour Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill
articles.content:
Foreign Women Tour Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Women of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here visited the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill Wednesday on the occasion of the 99th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets at the mosaics depicting the images of President Kim Il Sung among reeling workers and leader Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the Mill and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They also placed bunches of flowers at a mosaic depicting the image of Kim Jong Suk among workers and paid tribute to her.
					
					 Being briefed on the history of the Mill which turned into a modern base for producing silk thread, the visitors went round its different parts, including the room for education in the revolutionary history, the room dedicated to the history of the Mill and the silk reeling workshop.

articles.title: Sojourn in Pyongyang of Chinese and Overseas Koreans Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle
articles.content:
Sojourn in Pyongyang of Chinese and Overseas Koreans Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle visited the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site on Wednesday.
					 The visitors paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk before a mosaic portraying them.
					
					 They went round the monument to field guidance of the peerlessly great persons, and a submachine-gun performance test ground and submachine-gun firing range which are associated with their feats.
					
					 Zhou Haiqiao, granddaughter of Zhou Bao-zhong, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, said that she could know better about the immortal exploits the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu performed for the development of the defense industry of DPRK and she hoped Korean people would firmly safeguard the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation by making more sophisticated weapons under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, upholding the banner of self-development capability.
					
					 The son of Jiang Zihua, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, said that the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site is a significant place showing the history of the development of Korea's munitions industry. The DPRK could defeat the U.S imperialists and become an invincible military power as it had the great leader and the powerful munitions industry.
					
					 They also toured the Sci-Tech Complex, the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory, the Mirim Riding Club and other places.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- A memorial delegation of Koreans in Japan led by O Hyong Jin, permanent adviser to the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The members of the delegation looked round historic relics preserved with much care, being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President and the patriotic life of his family members.
					
					 The head of the delegation said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea and the eternal sun of Juche, devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and the nation and to the development of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We can never forget the benevolent love shown by the tender-hearted father who took warm care of the Koreans in Japan and led them. 
					
					 Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and all other compatriots in Japan will hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for all ages and uphold with loyalty the leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The delegation also visited the National Gifts Exhibition House, the Sci-Tech Complex, etc.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Venezuelan Figure
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Venezuelan Figure
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a gift from the general coordinator of the Federal Secretariat of the United Left Party of Venezuela on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 General Coordinator Felix Jesus Castillo handed the gift over to the DPRK ambassador to Venezuela on December 17.
					
					 He said he was pleased to present the gift reflecting his reverence for Kim Jong Un turning the DPRK into a powerful socialist fortress against imperialism.
					
					 Kim Jong Un also received a gift from the general manager of the Ahmadi Contract and Trade Company of Kuwait.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Members of Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Members of Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Dec. 19 received a letter from the members of a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China which had attended the memorial event marking the fifth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 The letter said that they attended the national memorial service held at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun in the presence of Kim Jong Un, where they looked up to the dazzling portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il displayed with due respect on the platform and couldn't repress their emotions picturing the arduous Songun march he made all his life and the ordinary simple padded jacket he kept on wearing till the last moments of his life.
					
					 It noted that during the memorial service they were astonished at the appearance of the motherland which has undergone a radical change beyond recognition under the guidance of Kim Jong Un in just 5 years.
					
					 His noble intention to let the people live in luxury and comfort under socialism without tightening their belts any longer has been translated into reality, something which could have been hardly imaginable, it said.
					
					 It pointed out they will further consolidate the general association into the patriotic ranks of loyalty that has taken its roots deep among the broad masses under the banner of Kim Jong Il's patriotism as befits the overseas soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il who live in the battle-sites of the anti-Japanese revolution in the northeast area from which Mt. Paektu is in sight.
					
					 Even if they live in a foreign country, they will always keep in mind the obligations of Koreans and more dynamically conduct the patriotic movement to make tangible contributions to the building of a powerful socialist country and bring up new generations to be genuine ones who would firmly carry forward the tradition of patriotism.

articles.title: Embroidery "Longing for Liberated Homeland"
articles.content:
Embroidery "Longing for Liberated Homeland"
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk created several embroideries in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, thus making a tangible contribution to developing the revolutionary embroidery.
					 One of them is embroidery "Longing for Liberated Homeland" she completed on the threshold of the great event of national liberation.
					
					 Saying that the life of all creatures would have been unthinkable without the sun, she embroidered the sun in praise of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Seen in the embroidery are also the beautiful scenery of Samsonam in Mt. Kumgang, deer and birds in a thick pine grove on a hill and cranes flying over it.
					
					 The embroidery symbolically shows the rapture over national liberation and the glory of liberated Korea having Kim Il Sung as the sun of the nation.

articles.title: Overseas Compatriots Leave
articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots Leave
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. headed by Chairman Yun Kil Sang and Pak Yong Ha, chairman of the Federation of Koreans in Australia, left here on Wednesday.
					 Also, departing here on the same day was Kim Won Baek, chairman of the Canada Western Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules NATO for Going Meddlesome
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules NATO for Going Meddlesome 
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- NATO, an organization serving the U.S. in Europe, is biting off more than it can chew.
					 The North Atlantic Council, a decision-making body of NATO, at a "special meeting" on Dec. 15 issued a statement denouncing the DPRK over the measures it has taken to bolster a nuclear force for self-defence.
					
					 The body in the statement called the DPRK's acts "violation of its obligation under international law including UNSC resolutions and a challenge to Nuclear Non-proliferation System," and made senseless remarks that those acts "increase threat to the international peace and security."
					
					 The statement mentioned "additional international sanctions and pressure" and held that all the nuclear weapons and existent nuclear and ballistic missile development program of the DPRK should be "dismantled in a complete, verifiable and irreversible way."
					
					 It is something beyond normality that the NATO whose mission is to "defend peace and security in the North Atlantic region" poke its nose into the Korean issue to which it is not entitled.
					
					 One thing clear is that by releasing the statement the NATO proved itself to be a puppet-like body serving the U.S. the same way as the south Korean puppet regime does and a merely nominal body which would move even at the beck and call of the puppet regime.
					
					 Before making public the statement, the deputy secretary-general of NATO had a huddle with the second vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea. Irony is that NATO is playing into the hands of the Park Geun Hye regime breathing its last due to the unprecedented hideous scandal.
					
					 As known, the Park Geun Hye group only parroted what was uttered by the U.S. master and particularly by the "divination omen" made by a shaman.
					
					 Shortly ago, the chief for diplomatic planning for north's nuclear program of the south Korean Foreign Ministry at a briefing in Seoul said that Europe is within the firing range of north Korean missiles and NATO has become a target as a whole, only to make fool of himself as he failed to answer questions raised by reporters demanding presentation of evidence proving the accuracy of information. This is by no means accidental.
					
					 Chris Ogden, an expert on security in Asia of Saint Andrewes University of Britain, held that key rivals of north Korea are south Korea, the U.S. and Japan, not Europe, adding the "story of threat to Europe by north Korean missiles" can be an exaggerated propaganda for getting diplomatic effect. 
					
					 Those with no insight into the trend of the times and without principle are bound to be treated as fool.
					
					 The moves for building armed forces independent of NATO being pushed forward by the European Union point to the international community's stand on NATO and its worth.
					
					 In the present unequal international relations swayed over by strength and high-handedness, to build strength for defending the country's sovereignty and right to existence is a full-fledged right of a sovereign state no one can deny.
					
					 NATO, a body bereft of independence and playing into the hands of the south Korean puppet forces, should not say this or that about the DPRK as it is unaware of the essence of the issue, but had better stop functioning as a tool harassing international peace and security.

articles.title: Confrontation Maniacs Are Doomed to Ruin: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Confrontation Maniacs Are Doomed to Ruin: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Yes men of Park Geun Hye in south Korea are inviting ridicules from the public for persisting in the failed confrontation policy toward the DPRK even in the grip of the worst crisis.
					 Prime Minister Hwang Kyo An, Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se, Minister of Unification Hong Yong Phyo and other puppet conservatives are still vociferating about "consistently adhering to the established north policy and foreign policy such as keynote for tightening sanctions against the north" and "counteraction against the nuclear issue of the north through close cooperation with the international community".
					
					 These are nothing but the last-ditch efforts of top-class stooges of Park Geun Hye and anachronistic acts of traitors to maintain her heinous confrontation policy to the last in utter disregard of the demand of the nation and their crimes.
					
					 The established domestic and foreign policies touted by human scum are sycophantic and submissive ones placing outside forces above the nation and hostile policies of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 Their "north policy" aiming at "unification under liberal democracy," in particular, is the evil theory of confrontation between the social systems to expand the U.S. colonial ruling system to the north, backed by outside forces.
					
					 Fully opening rice market to outsiders, indefinite extension of transfer of OPECON, implementation of "tailored deterrence strategy", THAAD deployment, humiliating "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, the conclusion of the south Korea-Japan agreement on the military intelligence protection, etc. are despicable products of the policies of following foreign forces and escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye puppet group froze the north-south relations by pursuing the confrontation policy of regarding the compatriots in the north as principal enemy and war rival and turned south Korea into a complete colony of the U.S. and a theatre of nuclear stand-off of big powers. These are the thrice-cursed crimes committed by them.
					
					 The candlelight actions sweeping across south Korea have already passed a severe judgment on traitor Park Geun Hye and sentenced her treacherous policy to death.
					
					 Nevertheless, the group of conservatives are desperately sticking to the confrontation policy without any guilty conscience and sense of reflection. Their behavior amounts to act of challenging the aspiration of the nation and the trend of the times.
					
					 As proved by history, confrontation between fellow countrymen is the road to treachery and all those who sought a way out in confrontation suffered destruction without exception.
					
					 It is quite natural that south Koreans from all walks of life brand Hwang Kyo An as "second Park Geun Hye" and Yun Pyong Se, Hong Yong Phyo and so on as top-class guardians of Park and accomplices in the extra-large scandal and demand they be brought to the court of history.
					
					 Those who followed the confrontation policy of the witch of Chongwadae are doomed to ruin.

articles.title: Socialist Education Is Important Work Related to Destiny of Country and Future of Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Socialist Education Is Important Work Related to Destiny of Country and Future of Revolution: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday carries an article to mark the 10th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "It Is Urgent Requirement of Our Times and Our Revolution to Strengthen Socialist Education".
					 The work, published on Dec. 20, Juche 95 (2006), comprehensively deals with all issues ranging from the importance and principle of socialist education to its form, method and contents, as well as the theoretical and practical issues arising in strengthening socialist education, the article says, adding:. 
					
					 To strengthen socialist education is an important work which builds up the pillar of faith that the cause of socialism is sure to win.
					
					 The road of socialism is the one covered by the faith, and socialism is the tower of success built by faith and will.
					
					 Not all those living in the socialist society have the faith in socialism nor does it last even though it was kept once. Even those who worked hard for the country and the people once may kneel down to difficulties and be degenerated insidiously if they are not educated by socialist idea.
					
					 By socialist education, people come to clearly understand that our leader and our party are the best, Korean-style socialism is the best in which the Juche-oriented viewpoint on the people and people's philosophy are embodied and bulwark of single-minded unity that no one can have or imitate is formed, and feel high national pride and self-esteem living in the socialist society.
					
					 Socialist education is the driving force kindling the flame of patriotism in the hearts of all service personnel and people and instilling strength and courage for the prosperity of the country into them.

articles.title: DPRK's Bolstering Nuclear Deterrence Is Just: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Bolstering Nuclear Deterrence Is Just: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Huan Qui Shibao recently made public a commentary titled "China's Armaments and Strategic Nuclear Force Are Not Yet Enough".
					 The gist of the commentary is as follows: The U.S. is openly threatening China under the pretence of trade and the issue of Taiwan. That is why China should have strategic nuclear force equal to that of the U.S. To bolster nuclear force is the foundation for China's developing of economy to the full and it is a contribution to world peace.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 China seeks a way to counter the highly possible increase of threat by the U.S. with bolstering nuclear force.
					
					 Much more, it is too natural for the DPRK to bolster the nuclear deterrence as it has always been exposed to the U.S. threat.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail to the DPRK, a country of small territory and population, is enormously incomparable with what neighboring powers have been exposed.
					
					 The U.S. has threatened the DPRK for more than half a century and run amuck to pressurize it while imposing sanctions upon it to check the development of its self-reliant economy and turn it into a colonial slave.
					
					 The social system in the DPRK is different from that of the U.S. and the service personnel and people of the DPRK are not yielding to the U.S. pressure. This cannot be the reason for them to face nuclear threats, sanctions and pressure.
					
					 Very just is the DPRK's bolstering nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The foundation for the DPRK's development and prosperity and guarantee for peace on the Korean peninsula lie in bolstering its nuclear deterrence. Nobody can dare deny this just theory.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Criticizes U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Criticizes U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the world's major media including the U.S. internet media NK NEWS said that Obama claimed the DPRK would "collapse" soon due to its instability, but there is no sign of "collapse" in its social system.
					 From an objective point of view no unstable factor can be found there. Economy is growing and its people live full of hope, a proof of the victory of the DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 Not a few people have already faced up to realities, being awakened from the wild dream of the DPRK's "collapse."
					
					 With what ground did Obama claim the DPRK's "collapse"? Park Geun Hye, who received a hint from Choe Sun Sil, was behind his story about "collapse".
					
					 As the U.S. shaped its hostile policy toward the DPRK under the influence of Park it has totally failed. The U.S. should recognize this fact.
					
					 The above-said assertions were unanimously made by media.
					
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday says in a commentary:
					
					 This is a kind of mockery of the U.S. which is behaving arrogantly, obsessed with its scenario for world domination. 
					
					 It is quite natural that the world is jeering not only at Park Geun Hye but also at Obama for acting like marionettes of the shaman.
					
					 It is foolish and abashed for Obama to have recklessly behaved, believing what Park Geun Hye uttered as he was utterly ignorant of the DPRK.
					
					 He can blame no one for it as he has persistently resorted to the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, not lending an ear to the repeated advices of the DPRK and the world.
					
					 Obama brought the U.S. another ill-fame of being a superpower dancing to the tune of the marionette of the shaman in addition to the disgrace of being a rogue state.
					
					 Either Obama or his master may suffer bitterer shame and disgrace if they seek to achieve their goals by using south Korean puppets or the like.

articles.title: Japan Should Behave with Prudence and Self-control: Researcher
articles.content:
Japan Should Behave with Prudence and Self-control: Researcher
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Wednesday carries a commentary contributed by Kim Hong Hwi, a researcher of the Institute for Japan Studies.
					 Japan is impatient to bring into relief the "missile threat" from the DPRK, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 Kyodo News reported that the Japanese government is examining a plan for evacuation drill of citizens under the simulated condition of the DPRK's ballistic missile launch in March of next year.
					
					 Japan also plans to make a decision on new fiscal state budget in the offing days the defence budget of which is estimated to reach the biggest-ever of 5 100 billion yen, and one of its core parts is the formation of theatre missile defense system to cope with the DPRK's missile.
					
					 As can be known by this, Japan is seeking to claim the "missile threat" from the DPRK as a pretext of its arms buildup.
					
					 Talking about the non-existent "missile threat" from the DPRK, Japan is working hard to foster consciousness of extreme security crisis among its people and avail itself of the opportunity to make preparations in real earnest for overseas militarist aggression.
					
					 But, Japan's tricky method would get it nowhere
					
					 The international community including surrounding countries of Japan is expressing strong vigilance against its moves to realize the ambition of reinvasion that would wreck peace and stability.
					
					 If Japan continues to follow the road of making provocations for a war, defying the demand of international community, this will entail foolish consequences of inviting its own ruin. If the Japanese reactionaries sincerely want security on Japan's archipelago, they should behave with prudence and self-control.

articles.title: End of Park Geun Hye Cannot but Be More Miserable: S. Korean Online Paper
articles.content:
End of Park Geun Hye Cannot but Be More Miserable: S. Korean Online Paper
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People said in an editorial on Dec. 19 that Park Geun Hye officially submitted a written challenge to the people by saying in her "written answer" submitted to the "constitutional court" on Dec. 16 that as the passage of the motion calling for her impeachment at the "National Assembly" is illegal, the reason for her impeachment is also not true and there is no evidence proving this, the motion must be rejected.
					 Saying that there has begun a war which will end only when either the "president" or the people win, the editorial noted that the end of Park cannot but be more miserable.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties React Angrily to Park Geun Hye's Evading Responsibility
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties React Angrily to Park Geun Hye's Evading Responsibility
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean opposition parties on Dec. 18 reacted strongly to the "written answer" submitted by Park Geun Hye to the "constitutional court", through which she tried to shirk her responsibility, denying her crimes, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 A lawmaker from the Minju Party protested against the "written answer", saying that the worst "president" made the people be ashamed of as she submitted the worst "written answer".
					
					 KBS said the opposition camp is repeatedly demanding the early ruling by the "constitutional court".

articles.title: S. Korean Diplomat Sexually Abuses Chilean Minor
articles.content:
S. Korean Diplomat Sexually Abuses Chilean Minor
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The fact that a south Korean puppet diplomat working in Chile sexually abused a minor of the country was made public to spark off a big splash, according to the south Korean KBS on December 19.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Demands Truth behind Dissolution of Unified Progressive Party
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Demands Truth behind Dissolution of Unified Progressive Party
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People Tuesday posted an editorial on the lapse of two years since the Unified Progressive Party was forcibly dissolved.
					 At a time when the motion on impeachment of Park Geun Hye was passed, restoring democracy is the most important social task and no one can talk about democracy unless the probe into the truth behind the dissolution of the party and punishment of those affiliated to it are made, the editorial said, adding;
					
					 As disclosed by a memorandum released by the former chief secretary for Civil Administration of Chongwadae, the dissolution of the party was the product of plot hatched by the former presidential chief of staff of Chongwadae and the director of the "constitutional court". 
					
					 It stressed that for restoring democracy positive solidarity of all progressive and democratic forces is urgently required.

articles.title: Round-Table Talks Held in Various Countries
articles.content:
Round-Table Talks Held in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held in Myanmar, India and Malaysia from Dec. 8 to 12 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar lauded HE Kim Jong Il as an outstanding leader being boundlessly revered by the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 The general secretary of the Indian National Congress Party, the secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India and other speakers said that though Kim Jong Il passed away, his exploits for the times and humankind are shining.
					
					 The theory of Songun politics formulated by him serves as an invincible banner to firmly defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation under the situation in which imperialists' moves for stifling the DPRK are getting more undisguised, they added.
					
					 The secretary of the Malaysian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu stressed that Kim Jong Il is always alive in the hearts of the people as he warmly loved them and devoted his all to them

articles.title: Nigerian Body Blasts U.S. Strategy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Blasts U.S. Strategy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Dec. 9 posted on its website an article condemning the U.S. strategy towards the DPRK.
					 The article said that the U.S. is still seized by a daydream that the DPRK might collapse in the face of the former's nuclear threat and blackmail, persistent human rights racket and sanctions. It went on:
					
					 In the past days, the Japanese imperialists ruthlessly sucked everything out of Korea for more than four decades after turning it into a colony. There were only weeding hoes and sickles left in Korea.
					
					 The U.S. inflicted three years of war on the DPRK, reducing it to ashes.
					
					 But the DPRK didn't beg others for help. It built a country of the people with trust in their strength and by counting on them.
					
					 The DPRK only believed in its own might even in that harsh period in which it had to tighten its belt in the face of the ever-growing sanctions, blockade and moves by the imperialists and riff-raffs.
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in the first H-bomb test in Jan. 2016, demonstrating its formidable might and has taken such substantial countermeasures as a series of successes in the underwater test-fire of SLBM, test-fire of surface to surface medium- and long-range strategic rocket Hwasong-10 and nuclear warhead explosion test in a bid to staunchly smash the U.S. and other hostile forces' nuclear threat and sanctions racket.
					
					 World media vied with each other to report that the U.S. rather helped the DPRK bolster up its nuclear force on a high level and the latter has had capabilities to actually attack the U.S. mainland, and it has no ways to escape from this.
					
					 The U.S. strategy toward the DPRK is a total failure.

articles.title: Cambodian Media Praise Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cambodian Media Praise Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Cambodian media gave special publicity to the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il in the period from Dec. 1 to 11.
					 The Cambodian paper Nokor Thom Daily carried an article, illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The paper recalled that he made a journey of field guidance for the people even in the last days of his life, regarding their happiness as his greatest happiness, adding: His noble life would be always remembered by the Korean people and other progressive people of the world.
					
					 AKP praised the ideological and theoretical feats and Songun leadership ones of the peerlessly great man which are an eternal foundation guaranteeing the prosperity of socialist Korea and happiness of its people, adding that the Korean people are holding him in high esteem as the eternal leader.
					
					 It also quoted what foreign prominent figures said, praising him as a peerless statesman, brilliant commander, all-round leader and peerlessly great sage.
					
					 The Cambodian State Radio Broadcasting said that he is the eternal leader of the Korean people and the idea and lines set forth by him serve as the banner of illumining the road to be followed by the Korean people.
					
					 The greatest of his feats is to firmly defend socialism, it said, adding that he continued making journeys of devotion for the country and the people throughout his life and thus provided an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Apsara Radio Broadcasting and F.M. 90. 5 Radio of Cambodia also praised his whole life characterized by the love for the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de tiro de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de tiro de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio la competencia de disparo de las companias de artillero de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados de las grandes unidades combinadas del EPC.
					„ÄÄEn la ocasion tomaron parte las companias de artillero de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados seleccionadas en las grandes unidades combinadas del EPC.
					
					„ÄÄEn el puesto de vigilancia, el Maximo Dirigente escucho el parte sobre la forma y metodo de la competencia y dio la orden de iniciarla.
					
					„ÄÄMirando los movimientos de manejo de canones de los artilleros, el Comandante Supremo dijo que ellos han realizado de manera intensiva los ejercicios en condiciones mas dificiles y agrego que los artilleros deben entrenarse en las circunstancias semejantes a la guerra real para tirar siempre los proyectiles certeros.
					
					Dada la orden de "Fuego", los participantes en la competencia dieron el fuego simultaneo con la voluntad de convertir de una vez la posicion enemiga en un mar de fuego.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho elogiando a los artilleros como francotiradores diciendo que parece que los proyectiles tienen ojos.
					
					Evaluo altamente la marcha exitosa de la competencia.
					
					Subrayo que la competencia de canonazo de hoy ha comprobado otra vez que los artilleros pueden cumplir satisfactoriamente con todas las ordenes dadas en cualquier momento, si realizan en el ambiente de combate real el entrenamiento dando prioridad a mejorar la efectividad de canonazo y mover y preparar rapidamente conforme a sus misiones y situaciones en cambio.
					
					Kim Jong Un dio las instrucciones preciosas para el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas artilleras.
					
					Este ano se inicio y se termina con los canonazos de los artilleros, subrayo y exhorto a los comandantes y artilleros abrir con los disparos certeros el camino de avance hacia el Sur y festejar la victoria en la guerra, al desarrollar dia y noche los entrenamiento sabiendo bien el proposito del partido que presta gran atencion al perfeccionamiento de los preparativos de combate de los artilleros.
					
					En esta competencia la compania de artillero de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados adscrita al octavo cuerpo del EPC ocupo el primer lugar, mientras las otras adscritas al tercer y septimo cuerpo, el segundo y tercer lugares, respectivamente.
					
					A las companias adscritas a octavo, tercer, septimo, decimo y noveno cuerpo del EPC se entregaron el diploma, la medalla y la insignia de artillero certero.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicio de aviacion combativa de asalto nocturne
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicio de aviacion combativa de asalto nocturno 
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente del partido, Estado y ejercito Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el ejercicio de vuelo combativo para el asalto nocturno de los aviadores del regimiento de cazas del Heroe Kil Yong Jo.
					El Dirigente salio a la pista de estacionamiento para cerciorarse del estado preparativo de salida de aviones.
					
					El Comandante Supremo subio al puesto de vigilancia donde escucho el parte de decision del comandante de las Fuerzas Aereas y Antiaereas del EPC viendo el plano para la realizacion del entrenamiento y dio la orden del inicio del ejercicio. 
						
					
					El Comandante Supremo dijo que aun en la oscuridad pueden conocer bien si los cazas vuelan correctamente y mostro alegria senalando que los pilotos mantienen bien el sistema de vuelo y se han realizado en alto nivel la cientifizacion y la modernizacion del mando de navegacion.
					
					Los aviones de caza llegaron por turno al espacio aereo sobre el blanco.
					
					Viendo en la pantalla el certero golpe aereo, el Maximo Dirigente estaba muy alegre.
					
					Cada vez que presencio los ejercicios de aviadores de combate, siempre enfatizaba en que la defensa del cielo patrio no se realiza solo en las horas y condiciones climaticas favorables y la guerra moderna se efectua en las peores condiciones, acoto y destaco la necesidad de organizar de continuo tales ejercicios  para cultivar a los pilotos de combate la capacidad de cumplir satisfactoriamente con sus misiones aun en cualesquier condiciones desfavorables.
					
					Aunque hice desarrollar inesperadamente los dificiles ejercicios de vuelo de asalto nocturno, los fidedignos pilotos de nuestro partido demostraron que estan estrictamente preparados para cumplir las cualesquier ordenes, subrayo y enfatizo que gracias a estas guardias de cielo, armadas con el indoblegable espiritu de defensa a ultranza a la patria, sera siempre claro y azul el cielo de la patria.
					
					El Comandante Supremo se reunio con los aviadores de combate participantes en el entrenamiento y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Tomando uno a otro las manos de ellos, evaluo altamente su espiritu indoblegable demostrado en el presente entrenamiento y dijo que los excelentes aviadores son el gran orgullo del partido, la patria y el pueblo. Les encomendo a trasladar su saludo a todos los pilotos y los militares de la unidad y sus familiares.
					
					Dio agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC al Regimiento de Aviones de Caza Heroe Kil Yong Jo y dispenso benevolencias a ser transmitidas de generacion en generacion.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil, primer subjefe y director general de Operaciones del EMG del EPC y el primer subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Ri Pyong Chol.

articles.title: Canciller coreano expresa condolencias a su homologo aleman
articles.content:
Canciller coreano expresa condolencias a su homologo aleman
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Yong Ho envio el dia 21 un mensaje de condolencias al ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Federal de Alemania, Frank-Walter Steinmeier, en relacion con que hubo muchas perdidas humanas debido a un ataque terrorista ocurrido en Berlin.
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso la profunda simpatia y condolencias al destinatario y los familiares de las victimas.
					
					Reafirmando la posicion invariable del gobierno de la RPDC contra todo tipo de terrorismo, el remitente deseo que el gobierno y el pueblo de Alemania liquiden cuanto antes las consecuencias del incidente.

articles.title: Organos coreanos envian ofrendas florales a embajada rusa
articles.content:
Organos coreanos envian ofrendas florales a embajada rusa 
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Varios organos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea enviaron los dias 20 y 21 las ofrendas florales a la embajada rusa en Corea en senal de condolencias por el deceso de Andrei Gennadiyevich Karlov, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Federacion Rusa en la Republica de Turquia. 
					Fueron colocadas ante una foto del difunto las ofrendas florales enviadas por el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, el de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, el Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y la Direccion General de Trabajo con el Cuerpo Diplomatico.
					
					Estuvieron presentes el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Sin Hong Chol, el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero Ri Kwang Gun, el vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero So Ho Won, y subdirector general de Trabajo con el Cuerpo Diplomatico Mun Jae Chol y otros funcionarios coreanos. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto y firmaron el libro de condolencias.

articles.title: Efectuado seminario de la rama de ciencias sociales sobre proezas de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Efectuado seminario de la rama de ciencias sociales sobre proezas de Kim Jong Un 
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 21 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el seminario de la rama de ciencias sociales sobre las proezas del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien organizo y condujo a la victoria la campana de 200 dias. 
					En la ocasion se presentaron las disertaciones que explican y argumentan las proezas de direccion del Mariscal quien al organizar y dirigir al frente la campana de 200 dias abrio otra coyuntura de viraje en la historia de la construccion de potencia socialista. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que con extraordinaria inteligencia y diestra capacidad organizativa, el Mariscal hizo desarrollar una gran campana ideologica en ambito de todo el partido para poner de pleno manifiesto la fuerza espiritual de los militares y civiles, y realizo incansables visitas de orientacion sobre el terreno para que en todos los sectores y todas las unidades se avivaran las llamas de creacion de la velocidad de Mallima.
					
					Prosiguieron que al traer la victoria milagrosa de conversion de lo desfavorable en lo favorable mediante la campana de defensa y servicio al pueblo, manifesto a todo el mundo el temperamento revolucionario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que sirve para el pueblo y consolido los lazos consanguineos entre el Partido y las masas. 
					
					Bajo la orientacion del Mariscal, en el periodo de la campana de 200 dias se han fortalecido con firmeza la capacidad de autodefensa nacional basada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares y la posicion estrategica de la RPDC, subrayaron y agregaron que el Mariscal abrio la nueva era dorada de la construccion de potencia civilizada socialista al abrir la brecha para el cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional. 
					
					Llamaron a todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores a armarse con firmeza con las proezas de direccion del Mariscal y guardar en lo profundo del corazon la conviccion de que gracias a este gran hombre triunfara sin falta la causa de construccion de potencia socialista de tipo jucheano. 
					
					Asistieron al seminario los funcionarios interesados, los profesores, investigadores, conferenciantes, periodistas y redactores de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, prensa e informacion, la rama de la historia revolucionaria y los centros de formacion de cuadros partidistas.

articles.title: Minju Joson advierte a Japon que actue con prudencia
articles.content:
Minju Joson advierte a Japon que actue con prudencia
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El periodico Minju Joson publico este miercoles un comentario escrito por Kim Hong Hwi, investigador del Instituto de Asuntos Japoneses. 
					El comentarista senalo que ahora Japon esta muy desesperado para someter a la discusion la "amenaza de misil" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y continuo:
					
					Segun la agencia noticiera Kyodo, el gobierno japones esta examinando el plan de ejercicios de defensa antiaerea de los civiles con rumbo a ponerlo en practica en marzo del proximo ano suponiendo el lanzamiento de misil balistico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Y en el presupuesto estatal del ano nuevo, que se aprobara dentro de unos dias, se asignaran como fondos para la defensa 5 billones y 100 mil millones de yenes (moneda japonesa), cifra mas alta en su historia. Y una parte medular para la defensa nacional es la formacion del sistema antimisiles contra la RPDC. 
					
					Como vemos, Japon intenta utilizar la "amenaza de misil" de la RPDC como un pretexto de su aumento armamentista. 
					
					Hablando ruidosamente de la inexistente "amenaza de misil" de la RPDC, el pais insular intenta sembrar en la poblacion la inquietud de seguridad y aprovecharlo para dar acicate a los preparativos de agresion militarista a ultramar. 
					
					Pero, no se sale con la suya tal intencion del pais isleno. 
					
					La sociedad internacional incluso los paises vecinos de Japon expresan grave precaucion por las maniobras de Japon destinadas a realizar la reagresion, que perturban la paz y la estabilidad.
					
					Si Japon sigue recurriendo como ahora a las maniobras de provocacion de guerra despreciando la demanda de la sociedad internacional, sufrira la autodestruccion. 
					
					Si los reaccionarios japoneses desean de veras la seguridad de su archipielago, han de actuar con prudencia.
